name: Where are My Pipes?
description:
Beaver versus water supply – reverse the chaos
caused by the furry troublemaker!
You'll have to work hard, all the pipes are ruined.
The houses and their occupants are left without
water.

45 locations, a lot of lengths of pipe and cunning
engineering solutions, and one mischievious
beaver working against you.

Time to tighten the screws!
